### Mapping Police Violence

Worksheet 3 "2013-2020 Killings by State"

```

Worksheet 4 "Police Killings of Black Men"

```

# <ins> Drawing the Black Box </ins>

## <ins> Property data </ins>

Most cities have property data available you can download for free: "Property Vaulation and Assessment Data". 

### NYC Real Estate Assessment Property data.
Built with the Department of Finance values.
Source: https://data.cityofnewyork.us/City-Government/Property-Valuation-and-Assessment-Data/yjxr-fw8i

### MassGIS - MA Interactive Property Map
Datasets per city ready for download.
Source: https://massgis.maps.arcgis.com/apps/OnePane/basicviewer/index.html?appid=47689963e7bb4007961676ad9fc56ae9

### LA County Open Data Initiative
Property related data: https://data.lacounty.gov/browse?category=Property%2FPlanning&utf8=%E2%9C%93

### Zillow
Source: https://www.zillow.com/research/data/

"Zillow publishes top-tier ZHVI (typical value for homes within the 65th to 95th percentile range for a given region) and bottom-tier ZHVI (typical value for homes that fall within the 5th to 35th percentile range for a given region)."

ZHVI All Homes - Top tier time series $ (Metro and US)
```{r echo=FALSE}
data(zhvi_toptier)
kbl(head(zhvi_toptier[, 1:6]))
```

..

ZHVI All Homes - Bottom tier time series $ (Metro and US)
```{r echo=FALSE}
data(zhvi_bottomtier)
kbl(head(zhvi_bottomtier[, 1:6]))
```


## <ins> Public Safety </ins>

According to LA County Open Data initiative, Public Safety includes Sheriff, Fire, and other Emergency related datasets

## <ins> Complaints &/or Settlements </ins>

### National Police Funding Database
Source: https://policefundingdatabase.tminstituteldf.org/misconductsettlements

Data on:
- Federal Grants
- Police Consent Degrees
- Police Misconduct Complaints (Only Chicago, IL)
- Police Misconduct Settlemtns
- Policy changes via Policy


### Open Police
US wide data on police complaints
Home page: https://openpolice.org/
Source: https://github.com/flexyourrights/openpolice

I have no idea how to access the data. Still exploring


### NYPD Misconduct Complaint Database
Source: https://www.nyclu.org/en/campaigns/nypd-misconduct-database


### Citizens Police Data Project
Source: https://cpdp.co/
collects and publishes information about police misconduct in Chicago

### City of Tacoma
Source: https://data.cityoftacoma.org/Public-Safety/Complaint-Allegations-with-Findings/x46s-jtje

Source of complaint, "Citizen", no other information is given about who complaints. Other relevant information is the Finding of the complaint.

Types of allegation
```{r echo=FALSE}
data(complaint_cot)
kbl(unique(complaint_cot$Allegation))
```

..

Finding/ruling on complaint
```{r echo=FALSE}
data(complaint_cot)
kbl(unique(complaint_cot$Finding))
```

Source: https://www.capstat.nyc/commands/#10/40.7618/-73.5686
